snippet.title: Humankind - Official Trailer | Game Awards 2020
snippet.description:
Humankind's latest trailer confirms an April 2021 release date, alongside the promise of a chance to get to play a new OpenDev scenario of the game this December.

#IGN #TheGameAwards2020
